title: Lindsay Rhodes Maternity Leave Spectacular
itunes:title: Lindsay Rhodes Maternity Leave Spectacular
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Lindsay Rhodes, & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from Around the NFL including Brandon Beane taking over as the Bills general manager, and Michael Floyd signing with the Vikings. Then, in celebration of the upcoming arrival of Lindsay’s new baby, the heroes look into the future and predict what the NFL will look like when Lindsay returns from maternity leave on September 1st.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
